alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 8:35AM MST until January 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, with locally higher amounts of 3 to 6 inches above 5500 ft. * WHERE...Southern Twin Falls County zone. US Highway 93 from Twin Falls southward is included. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Breezy west wind gusts of 20-25 mph may generate blowing snow and reduced visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
